value.name: Third suspect charged in December double homicide
value.description: A third person has been charged in the deaths of two people near Kalamazoo in late December. Tikario McMillon, 18, was arraigned Wednesday on two counts of open murder, two counts of felony murder, five counts of felony firearm and a count of first-degree home invasion.
